alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Gogebic; Iron; Menominee; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 4:14AM EDT until March 30 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING TO 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...A combination of snow, sleet, and freezing rain is expected tonight and Wednesday morning. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central Upper and western Upper Michigan. * WHEN...From 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ this evening to 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Some power outages will be possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to transition to primarily sleet and freezing rain overnight. With the gusty winds, expect some power outages to be possible and for some roads to be hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Dickinson; Gogebic; Iron; Menominee; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
